channel.title: Maps: Recently added blogs and sub-categories at ooh.directory

item.title: KnowWhere - GIScussions
item.description:
“Combines my thoughts and observations on UK geobusiness, with some largely irrelevant endeavours to incorporate my love of Arsenal with geography.”
By Steven Feldman.
🇬🇧 Started in 2006.
Average 441 words.

item.title: Transit Maps
item.description:
“A site devoted to the design and social impact of transit maps - subway maps, metro maps, bus maps, rail maps, ferry maps and more!”
By Cameron Booth.
🇺🇸 Started in 2010.
Average 415 words.

item.title: David Rumsey Historical Map Collection
item.description:

item.title: Doug McCune - Data Artist
item.description:
“I'm an Oakland artist who embraces data exploration and map making in an attempt to come to terms with the chaos of urban environments.”
🇺🇸 Started in 2007.
Average 952 words.
